ghost

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The game engine which processes all the logic of the game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected App app
      The App object running the game.
      protected boolean debug
      Boolean that toggles debug mode
      protected long frightenedLength
      The length that ghosts are frightened for when the superfruit is collected.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Fruit> fruits
      A list of all the fruit in the game.
      protected boolean gameEnded
      Boolean that is true if the game is ended, false if the game is underway.
      protected int gameEndedCount
      The counter for the 10 second timer between games.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Ghost> ghosts
      A list of all the ghosts in the game.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<char[]> grid
      A grid of characters that represent the map/
      protected long lives
      The number of lives waka has, specified by the config file.
      protected java.lang.String mapFileName
      The name of the text file containing the map
      protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Long> modeLengths
      The array of mode lengths specifying the duration of alternating between scatter and chase mode.
      protected Movable.Direction nextMove
      The next move inputted by the player.
      protected java.util.ArrayList<GameObject> objects
      An array list of all the objects in the game.
      protected Waka player
      The player object of the game
      protected long speed
      The speed of the game.

        The counter for the 10 second timer between games.

        protected Movable.Direction nextMove
        The next move inputted by the player.

        protected long speed
        The speed of the game. 1 or 2 depending on the config file.

        protected long lives
        The number of lives waka has, specified by the config file.

        The name of the text file containing the map

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameManager

        public GameManager(App app)

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
        Reads configuration file, reads map file and generates all the game objects.

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Runs all the logic in the game. When the game is in progress, it calls the tick() functions of all the game objects and draws all the game objects. If game is won or lost, it displays the win/lose screen and counts 10 seconds before restarting the game.

      • readConfig

        public void readConfig()
        Uses JSONParser to parse through the JSON config file, and sets all the variables that the config file changes.

      • restartGame

        public void restartGame()
        Called when the 10 second timer between games expires. Calls restart function of player, ghosts and fruit. Resets the game ended timer and sets gameEnded variable to false.
